name: YOU ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ COMPLETE ME
description:
a two player coop dancing game

to be played with a single shared controller

made in collaboration with my so

based on this tweet by Pippin Barr

this is a companion piece to Rise & Shine

music is Frédéric Chopin - Piano Concerto no. 2 in F minor, Op. 21 - III. Allegro vivace, performed by Neal O'Doan
